summary: This is an email chain from August 7, 2019, discussing a potential meeting regarding a murder-for-hire plot against someone's ex-girlfriend. The email also mentions potential travel related to 'Epstein stuff'.

events.title: Email about murder-for-hire meeting
events.description: An email exchange discusses arranging a meeting in a non-public place in New Jersey regarding the murder of someone's ex-girlfriend.

keyFacts: The email subject is 'Murder for hire meet'.
The email mentions potential travel 'on more Epstein stuff'.
The requested meeting location is a non-public place in New Jersey.
The document is dated August 7, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The email chain is part of the Epstein case document release (EFTA00160037).
